[event]
# Alert
type=on_trigger
location=10,30,6,1
msg=TRAPPED!
repeat=false
requires_not_status=1stjugg
soundfx=soundfx/powers/quake.ogg

[event]
# Teleport to Volcano3
type=on_trigger
location=10,31,6,1
intermap=maps/volcano3.txt,12,1
requires_status=1stjugg

[event]
# Giant Fire Skeleton
type=on_load
location=12,18,1,1
requires_not_status=1stjugg
spawn=enemies/giantfireskeleton.txt,12,18
